trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mars
There were no other sightings in Mars on or around October 26th 2008
Summary: Gray silver object 1/4 mile away over housing development, seven field PA
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were leaving the house. i went out front door she had not come out yet. i looked to the west towards i 79 as i started down the steps at our house. i saw a gray thing sitting in the sky about a 1\4 mile from my position. watched it for a moment and turned went back to door and yelled at her to grab camera. she had gone into basement to exit through our garage. i stepped to get camera came out and it was there for a moment then moved west in an instant it was gone. i retired from the us air force in 2005 and know my aircraft on sound signature as well as visual recognition. i have never seen anything like this. i recently did some checking on web sites to see if anyone else had seen this. one article i read said a retired army person in the same area had pictures. so i thought i would contact someone and they gave me the link to this web site to report it. i now have my camera with me all the time.
